mapper.select: select id, empid, mounth, overtime from Benefit;
select id, empid, mounth, overtime from Benefit where id=#{id};
select id, empid, mounth, overtime from Benefit where empid=#{empid};
mapper.insert: insert into Benefit(id, empid, mounth, overtime) values (#{id},#{empid},#{mounth},#{overtime})
mapper.update: update Benefit set mounth=#{mounth},overtime=#{overtime} where id=#{id}
